name: Light
description: You tap a creature or object, igniting a tiny mote of floating starlight that hovers within 5 feet of the target. The mote sheds bright light in a 15â€‘foot radius and dim light for another 15 feet. As a bonus action, you can move the mote up to 20 feet to a point you can see. The mote winks out if it leaves your range or you create a new one.
